column4: guys? Anyone here has experience about avoiding so-called "honeypots" in Torrent world? I'm looking for a client for my Ubuntu machine.
Trevor: uhuh. Not sure how to avoid that. I've always downloaded with Usenet.
Trevor: my friend... i have NO clue whatsoever what 'peer guardian' is either. All i know is that some companies send ur ISP an email telling them that you're being naughty.
